achievements: Reduced code complexity and improved maintainability, resulting in fewer bugs and faster feature development, by migrating the website from Laravel to React.js and implementing a modular architecture.
Increased website performance score from 49% to 84% (Lighthouse Insights) by applying lazy loading, image compression, and code optimization techniques.

Ensured seamless integration between front-end and back-end systems, reducing communication errors and improving response time, by developing and implementing RESTful APIs using Node.js (Express) and MySQL.
Automated previously manual HR processes, significantly saving time and minimizing human errors, by building a web-based Human Resource Information System (HRIS).
Integrated APIs with efficient and error-minimized data flow, through collaboration with backend developers to understand API structures, align data requirements, and resolve integration challenges.
Accelerated the data collection process for assessors, by improving efficiency and ease of use through the development of a preliminary assessment application.
